question: Who Ties up with Symantec to fight cyber wars?
explanation: Country's top mobile operator Bharti Airtel has partnered with Symantec to provide cyber defense to enterprises. As part of the tie-up, Airtel will be the exclusive cyber security services partner for Symantec and will distribute the latter's enterprise security software, primarily targeting its existing enterprise customers. Through the partnership with Symantec, Airtel will help its enterprise customers to secure their systems.
